[npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] limited control over it, but [npc.is] still able to swish it from side to side.

[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldSquirrel(Skirren tails)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. Unlimited swishing!!!! #ENDIF
